description: This can be pan fry until golden colour or steam for healthier version. Either way taste good.
name: Steamed Thai Sesame Fish Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the white fish fillets in to pieces, and place in a food processor along with garlic. Process until finely chopped.
Veins removed and finely chop kaffir lime leaves, chopped coriander, fish sauce, yogurt, red curry paste,salt process well until combined. Adjust curry paste to heat requirement.

Lay a cling wrap on a table. Spread some sesame seeds. With a big spoon place a small portion of the paste on the cling wrap. Roll tightly in to small cylinders and tight both sides like a bon bon cracker.

Place in the fridge for one hour. Then steam until well cook. Remove the cling wrap and slice. 2nd method - shape the fish paste in to even sized pieces, roll in sesame seeds, and pan fry in oil till golden colour. Serve warm.
